Reviews.Title: Love the Dell!
Reviews.Author: Sarah E. Estes
Reviews.Content: It's a very nice computer with nice resolution.  At first, I was put off by the fact that it contained Windows 8; however, I gave myself a chance to learn it, and now I think it's great!I soon got Windows and Dell support for it, and am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: ABSOLUTE B. "ABSOLUTE B."
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop.... it works so fast and takes a couple secs to boot up and shutting down takes less than 2 secs...I am totally happy with my Dell laptop....I have gotten used to Windows 8 too...it's not to hard to figure out....infact I like it and now when i use my Windows 7 machine I tend to find myself slide to see what's to the other side only to remember it's not my new laptop..The memory 1 TB is the bestest....love it...Anyone thinking about this purchase go ahead make it.....it will be a great investment...Happy Customer

Reviews.Title: Worked great till mother board quit working
Reviews.Author: Thomas Ansinger
Reviews.Content: Worked great till mother board went bad.  Will have to contact Dell to get it replaced stoped working within 1 year.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Love this computer, windows 8 is easy to use and way faster then my old computer that was running vista. Recommend to any one looking for a fast and reliable computer.

Reviews.Title: Keyboard Problem
Reviews.Author: Jessica Z.
Reviews.Content: Unfortunally, I ordered that product in a vacation on EEUU and I didn't have chance to return it, because the keyboard is up sometimes and I put down it again, and this is a problem

Reviews.Title: Pretty good computer for a affordable price!
Reviews.Author: La'Keisha S
Reviews.Content: I thought that I was going to be lost since it has Windows 8 but I love it so far! Can't complain and I received it within the same week I ordered it!

Reviews.Title: Small keys!!
Reviews.Author: Varun Ranga
Reviews.Content: The keys are pretty small and when I got the laptop the keyboard was not properly fixed....It was making noise when I press any key. I pushed it and it was ok (though I feel its not comfortable yet). The rest is pretty good especially the display...The weird keyboard I have ever used...

Reviews.Title: never buy any dell, trust me.
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Dell has a long reputation of not being able to keep their machines cool. After just 3 months, my computer would overheat to the point of automatically shutting off. I've had to take it apart, pull the heat sink off the CPU, only to find that there was almost no thermal paste, and what was left had the consistency of dried out gum. Also, the heat sink makes an arc, passing from the CPU over the graphics card part of the motherboard. The heat from the CPU just gets passed on to the graphics card, so my GPU is always about 15 to 20 degrees hotter than the CPU, which gets up to 80 degrees with just internet browsing! Horrible design.Also, the battery dies after 2 months. What's the point of having a laptop that you have to haul around the power cord or else it dies after 5 minutes?Dell lies about battery life. They said it would last 6 hours light use, 4-5 hours moderate use, and 3 hours with heavy use like gaming. Lie. When I first bought it, it lasted 1 hour with heavy use and 2.5 hours with light use. Then, like I said, the battery completely died after 2 months.Never buy a dell, period. This is not a one off situation. Search the internet about dell overheating and dell skimping on hardware. You'll find lots of results.Also do a search on how horrible their customer service is.

Reviews.Title: Received wrong model
Reviews.Author: H. Rambert "SoloFrugalMama"
Reviews.Content: I received a Dell Inspiron i15 5521 which is not a comparable retail value.  Because I had gone through 2 exchanges previously, and needed my laptop, I kept it, and amazon did compensate me for the difference in value.  The laptop (5521) has similar specs to the 4146, and has performed well.  It has a Windows 8 rating around 6 (out of 10).  I was able to install office, and photoshop and it didn't seem to hang when using both simultaneously.  I was not able to install a game, it errored out when attempting to start it (attempted 10+ times even with a different product key, and just a no go).  Doesn't really matter since my purpose for this laptop is for school and personal business.  Not much bloatware, install of OS and initial set up went well, as did my removal of McAfee and installation of Norton.

Reviews.Title: Is this Touch Screen?
Reviews.Author: Caitlin
Reviews.Content: I've been doing research on this product, and I've been trying to locate the Touch Screen one, like on dell.com, and this is one that came up, but it doesn't specifically say "touch screen," so does that mean it's not? I'd like to find the touch screen one if I can, this is the link on the website: [...]Thank you!

3rd Generation Intel Core i5-3337U Processor (3M Cache, up to 2.7 GHz)
8 GB DDR3 RAM

ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 15 i15RM-4146SLV 15.6-Inch Laptop (Moon Silver)
